page.title: 15EAST PRESTON COMMUNITY.
page.content:
{East Preston Library (cont.)
the books borrowed by 2834 adult and 665 junior readers. Over 1300 people a month use the new photo-copier. Attractive displayes in a cabinet presented by E.P.P.C are changed every 3 weeks and contribute to the relaxed ,informal atmosphere. Stanly Holloway,the entertainer was a regular customer until his recent death. {Zachery Merton Hospital. When Zachery Merton, a rich man, recovered from an operation in 1936 he decided to show his gratitude by building 6 hospitals, including the one in Rustington.A 2 storey building, with 27 beds set in 3 acres of garden, it is now a community hospital. {
